title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_ServiceRoot.v0_1_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

APIVersion.description: The version of the RECS|Box extension.
APIVersion.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the version of the RECS|Box extension.  The format of this string shall be of the format majorversion.minorversion.errata in compliance with Protocol Version section of the Redfish specification.

ComposedNodes.description: This is a link to a collection of ComposedNodes.
ComposedNodes.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the ComposedNode schema.

EthernetSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of EthernetSwitches.
EthernetSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the EthernetSwitch schema.

PCIeSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeSwitches.
PCIeSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeSwitch schema.
